original_title: 99.9-刑事専門弁護士- 完全新作SP新たな出会い篇 〜映画公開前夜祭〜
overview: The super unconventional lawyer is back!  Our new friends are comic book girls! And the biggest enemy of all!  The strongest lawyer who manipulates the prosecution behind the scenes sets out to prove the devil... Take on a case that is 100% impossible to prove!
title: 99.9 Criminal Lawyer: SP
